subject: Need Help on how to write test cases for the methods that does in sert update and delete operation to Database
msgSnippet: Hi all, Pleased guide me in writing the JUnit test cases for the methods that does Insert Update and Delete to Databases. There are the methods that brings the
messageBody:
Hi all,

Pleased guide me in writing the JUnit test cases for the methods
that does Insert Update and Delete to Databases.
There are the methods that brings the Vector as bunch of data. Please guide
me about how to test them.
I am attaching a sample java file for which I need to write test cases.

<<ProcessConfiguration.java>>

Thanks and Regards
Ghanshyam
